title: Get A Behind-The-Scenes Look At The Minecraft Movie With This New Artbook

description:
Flowers are one of the most common Mother's Day gifts, but instead of buying a fresh bouquet of roses or tulips this weekend, what if you built a bouquet of pretty flowers with the special woman on your shopping list? Lego's Icons line has spawned all sorts of cool building kits, including a collection of pretty flowers that are both fun to put together and worthy of display.

Ahead of Mother's Day, which is this Sunday, May 12, we put together a list of Lego flowers and art that would make great gifts. Almost all of the Lego sets on this list are available for under $50, including gorgeous wildflower bouquets and a collection of po
title: Best Lego Gifts For Mother's Day - Save On Flower And Art Building Sets At Amazon

description:
Call of Duty's Season 3 Reloaded update added a few new features to Warzone's Verdansk map, and there's also a hidden Easter egg that can help you get geared up faster in your next match. Here we guide you through completing the floating doors Easter egg on Verdansk.

This new Easter egg seems to have been created by the developer to poke fun at the buggy doors that used to appear and float above the original map of Verdansk. Completing the secret steps can help you get equipped with guns, cash, ammo, a UAV, and a Precision Airstrike streak early in your match.

The floating doors Easter egg can
title: How To Complete Verdansk's Floating Door Easter Egg In CoD: Warzone

description:
Season 25 features some explosive new twists.

Apex Legends Season 25: Prodigy is introducing some major changes to the game--including the first new playable Legend to hit the game's roster since Alter showed up last May. But there's more to the battle royale's new season than character development, as Prodigy's launch includes new meta changes, exploding Bocek bow arrows, and the long-awaited return of a fan-favorite limited-time mode: Arenas.

Respawn has just released this season's patch notes, detailing all of the new content coming to the game when Season 25: Prodigy launches on Tuesday, May 6 at 10 AM PT / 1 PM ET. Keep scrolling for a play-by-play of what to expect
title: Apex Legends Season 25 Patch Notes: New Legend, Arenas Mode, And Progress On Major Audio Bugs

description:
Rockstar's Grand Theft Auto VI was poised to be 2025's biggest and best-selling game, but it was delayed to 2026. With GTA 6 no longer coming this year, 2025 may become "the year of Nintendo" thanks to the launch of the Switch 2 in June and the release of high-profile games like Mario Kart World. That's the opinion of analyst Serkan Toto of Kantan Games.

He told GamesRadar that publishers who w
title: After GTA 6 Delay, 2025 Becomes "The Year Of Nintendo," Analyst Says
PS5 Slim Astro Bot Bundles Still In Stock At Walmart, Sold Out At Other Retailers

description:
Recently, the internet-at-large has become fixated on a simple question: Could a single gorilla defeat 100 humans, or would the humans emerge victorious? Overwatch 2 is leaning into the discussion, as Blizzard has announced a special livestream for May 6 in which 100 copies of Soldier 76 will face off against a single Winston to see who wins.

The stream, which will take place May 6 at 12 PM PT / 3 PM ET, will also feature "surprise content creators" as the 100 Soldier 76s do battle with a single Winston. The official Overwatch X account is running a poll on who viewers think will win, with Winston holding a slight lead at 57 percent as of this writing.

1 Gorilla, 100 Soldiers: Who Wins? 🦍💯
Join us along with some sur
title: Overwatch 2 Will Weigh In On The "One Gorilla Vs. 100 Humans" Meme In Special Livestream

description:
One of the most iconic scenes in The Last of Us Part 2 is where Ellie does an impromptu concert for Dina playing A-ha's 1980s "Take On Me." When planning out Season 2, showrunner Craig Mazin knew he was going to include that moment, but also wanted to make sure he did it right. With Episode 4, fans got to see the scene recreated with Bella Ramsey and Isabela Merced in their respective roles.

Talking on Sony's Creator to Creator, Mazin, Ramsey, and Merced, along with co-stars Gabriela Luna and Young Mazino, talked about the early days of production and casting, but also trying to be as game-accurate as possible for the most important scenes.

"I was hoping the music shop scene would be included," said Merced. "That was really special to me and left a mark on me."

Cont
title: How The Last Of Us Episode 4's Iconic Ellie-Dina Scene Came Together

description:
Oblivion Remastered is already the third-best-selling game of 2025 in the US based on dollar sales after just one week on sale.

That data comes from Circana game industry analyst Mat Piscatella, who said it was also the best-selling game for the week ending on April 26. Oblivion Remastered's performance puts it behind only Monster Hunter Wilds and Assassin's Creed Shadows as 2025's other top-two-selling games.

It's an impressive stat for a game that is not only a remaster of a nearly 20-year-old title but one that was also shadow dropped with essentially no marketing (aside from
title: Oblivion Remastered Is Already The Third-Best-Selling Game Of 2025

description:
Cuphead fans can get a fantastic deal on a limited-edition art book at Amazon. Published by Dark Horse last November, The Art of Cuphead: The Delicious Last Course Deluxe Edition is on sale for $59.70 (was $100). The $40 discount is the best yet, but it probably won't be available for long. At the time of writing, 11% of units have been claimed.

Keep in mind that the Deluxe Edition for the original Cuphead art book has been out of print for years and is listed for rather high prices on the reseller market. It's unlikely that more copies of The Delicious Last Course Deluxe Edition will be printed once existing copies sell out at major
title: Cuphead Fans Can Save $40 On Official Limited-Edition Art Book

description:
A new remaster of the original Gears is on the way, as Microsoft has announced Gears of War: Reloaded for Xbox Series X|S, PS5, and Steam. It's coming to Game Pass on day one for Ultimate subscribers. This is just the latest remaster from Microsoft, following the successful debut of Oblivion Remastered in April.

Gears of War: Reloaded arrives on August 26 for $40, and it'll also be available to stream via Xbox Cloud Gaming. The game supports cross-play and cross-progression on all platforms. Anyone who already owns the digital version of Gears of War: Ultimate Edition will get Reloaded for free.

Reloaded features 4K resolution 120fps support, and multiplayer. "This is the definitive way to experience the game that started it all," Microsoft said.

Continue Reading at GameSpot
title: Gears Of War: Reloaded Remaster Coming To PS5, Xbox, And PC In August

description:
Sony has released the top downloaded games on PlayStation Network of April 2025 in North America and EU. The results for the month might sound surprising, as Microsoft games dominate the top spots on the PSN charts.

On PS5, Microsoft claims the top three download spots across North America and the EU with the Elder Scrolls IV: Oblivion Remastered, Minecraft, and Forza Horizon 5. This top 20 download list also, less surprisingly, includes Microsoft's Call of Duty: Black Ops 6. Other PS5 chart toppers for April include the recent releases of
title: Microsoft Titles Top The Charts For Best-Selling Games On PSN In April 2025

description:
A lawsuit filed against Bungie alleging the developer used copyrighted ideas in Destiny 2 just got more complicated, as a federal judge has rejected Bungie's attempt to have the case dismissed and ruled that evidence submitted by Bungie in the form of fan-made YouTube videos and wiki pages aren't acceptable.

The lawsuit filed by author Matthew Kelsey Martineau in late 2024 accuses Bungie of allegedly copying various ideas from their work, including Destiny 2's Red Legion faction and other elements like a giant celestial object hovering over Earth.

Bungie sought to have the case dismissed but has run into a strange problem. Many of the ideas Martineau cited as being accused of copyright, specifically Destiny 2's original Red War campaign and its Curse of Osiris campaign, haven't been playable for years. They've been removed from Destiny 2 as part of Bungie's "vaulting" process that sees the devel
title: Destiny 2 Lawsuit Continues As Judge Rejects Bungie's Use Of YouTube Videos And Wikis

description:
Easter may be over, but Spring has officially sprung in Hello Kitty Island Adventure's new "Month of Meh" update, and there's still plenty of egg-hunting to be had.

From now through May 31, Nisetama-san--a sub-character of Gudetama, Sanrio's resident apathetic egg yolk--will appear on the island. Nisetama-san's location will change each day, and players who manage to snap a photo of him will score some Egg Yolks that can be exchanged for prizes at the Egg Shrine. But snapping the elusive egg-man's photo isn't as easy as it sounds, as Nisetama-san will disappear if players take too long to get a shot of him.
title: Hello Kitty Island Adventure Is Celebrating Spring With An Egg-celent Free Content Update
Get A Massive Discount On Apple's Newest Mac Mini At Amazon

description:
Ubisoft has announced the next major update for Assassin's Creed Shadows, and it's coming soon. Title update 1.0.4 arrives on Tuesday, May 6, and it adds a new free quest and numerous bug fixes.

The update adds a story pack called "The Works of Luis Frois." Players can visit Azuchi to find Luis, a Jesuit priest, who has a mission for you. Players must complete the "Path he Walks" mission to start the new story chapter.

The patch also reduces an issue that could cause too many deer to spawn near roads, which in turn led them to run into harm's way. "Oh dear, watch out!" Ubisoft said in the patch notes.

Continue Reading at GameSpot
title: Next Assassin's Creed Shadows Update Announced, Adds New Story Mission And Fixes A Deer Problem

description:
There might be a major shakeup to how limited-time modes work with Call of Duty 2025 (which is still unannounced). A new report states that only players who have purchased a battle pass for the FPS will have access to modes tied to special events, like the Squid Game collaboration earlier this year.

Call of Duty insider "The Ghost of Hope" wrote on X that Activision is looking to "have more seasonal LTMs," but they will be locked behind the battle pass. Currently, all Call of Duty players have access to t
title: Call Of Duty 2025 Could Lock Limited-Time Modes Behind Battle Pass - Report
X-Men: The Manga Remastered - Get Both 512-Page Books For Cheap At Amazon

description:
A Minecraft Movie continues to soar at the box office, climbing above $870 million after about a month in theaters. This weekend, it faced new competition from Marvel's Thunderbolts* movie, and here's how the two films compared for their opening weekends in the US and globally.

Thunderbolts* made $76 million in the US for its opening weekend from May 2-4. For comparison, A Minecraft Movie debuted on April 4 and made $162.7 million worldwide over its first weekend in the US alone. This past weekend was A Minecraft Movie's fifth weekend in theaters, and it made $13.7 million in the US. Movie theaters held "block party" screenings of the movie this weekend, during which attendees were encouraged to go wild.

Thunderbolts* made $162.1 million worldwide for its opening weekend, compared to $301 million for A Minecraft
title: Thunderbolts' Success Shows Just How Big A Minecraft Movie Was

description:
One of the biggest story elements of The Last of Us games was how the infection spread, which was changed for the HBO adaptation. The removal of airborne spores divided fans, even though showrunners Neil Druckmann and Craig Mazin said they weren't sure if they were going to incorporate them, as it didn't make sense at the time. However, just last month, they confirmed at SXSW that spores would premiere sometime this season, and from the trailer for next week's episode, that time is now.

In the trailer, following last night's episode, we have Ellie (Bella Ramsey) and Dina (Isabela Merced) continuing on their quest to find the members of the WLF that attacked them, and the WLF gathering their numbers. There's also th
title: The Last Of Us Episode 5 Will Finally Introduce One Of The Game's Most Challenging Elements

description:
Back at CES 2025, gaming accessory company Genki showed off a new line of Nintendo Switch 2 accessories--and it provided a 3D-printed model of the then-unannounced console for reference. That model has officially drawn the ire of Nintendo, as the company has filed a lawsuit against Genki for what it calls "trademark infringement, unfair competition, and false advertising."

The lawsuit says that Genki broke multiple laws in its marketing of what Nintendo calls "unauthorized Nintendo Switch 2 accessories," which Nintendo alleges could lead to confusion for potential Switch 2 owners. The paperwork also references multiple instances of Genki's marketing of its Switch 2 lineup, including a "Genki Direct" livestream which aired at the same time as the Nintendo Switch 2 Direct in April, as well as
title: Nintendo Sues Accessory Firm Genki Over "Unauthorized" Switch 2 Lineup

description:
EA Sports has announced a deal with Major League Soccer to bring live soccer matches to EA Sports FC Mobile. Four games in the 2025 MLS regular season will be streamed through the mobile game's FCM TV portal. This will be a live simulcast with Apple TV, where MLS games also air.

The first game is Saturday, May 10, with the matchup between LA Galaxy and New York Red Bulls, beginning at 4:30 PM PT / 7:30 PM ET. The other games are May 17 (Atlanta United FC vs. Philadelphia Union) and two to be held in September with matchups set to be announced later.
title: EA Sports Is Doing Something It's Never Done Before

description:
Death, taxes, and video games getting delayed--it seems these are the three constants in 2025, with a number of high-profile video games getting delayed past their initial release dates. Some of these have been delayed far past their initial dates, while others have only been delayed more recently.

To help keep everything organized, we've made a list of every game delayed right now, including those with delays announced weeks, months, or even years ago. Once a game has been released, it will be removed from this list.


Grand Theft Auto VI


We all knew this was coming, if we're really being honest with ourselves. Initial
title: Every Game Delayed Right Now (2025 Edition)
